Html:
I've got more than one project I'm testing.

Where's the best place to copy the files to so that all projects have access to them.

Thanks, LisaAn

I experimented a bit and found that this works. I copied the files to C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\PrivateAssemblies

I put this in my main file: "using SoftwareApproach.TestingExtensions;"

Regards,

LisaAn
